mapper.select: SELECT c.res_class_name "resClassName", listagg(r.res_class_name, ',') within group(order by r.upper_res_class_id) "resClassName2", r.lv || '' as "lv" FROM ( SELECT upper_res_class_id, res_class_name, level as lv FROM RESCLASS START WITH upper_res_class_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR res_class_id = upper_res_class_id ) r JOIN RESCLASS c ON r.upper_res_class_id = c.res_class_id GROUP BY r.lv, c.res_class_name ORDER BY r.lv
